Looks like you got your stack dump.  Is that not what you were expecting?  I do not understand what the problem is with the output.

What we don't expect is the exceptions. Our product is based on eclipse, and generation of stack dump file is a function our product need support. But now when we try to get a stack dump in our product, the exceptions are thrown out. And besides, I didn't see the created stack dump file. (On Linux, there's a sentence telling where the stack dump file is created). And this function works well in Windows/Linux, only had problem in Mac.
The launcher has changed significantly in 3.3.  Can you retry in 3.3 M6?
i tried this in 3.3 RC3, not expect result is ouput.
